mapper.select: SELECT pos_privilege.* FROM pos_privilege INNER JOIN pos_role_privilege_r ON pos_privilege.id = pos_role_privilege_r.privilege_id INNER JOIN pos_role ON pos_role.id = pos_role_privilege_r.pos_role_id AND pos_role.deleted = 0 INNER JOIN user_pos_role_r ON pos_role.id = user_pos_role_r.pos_role_id AND user_pos_role_r.user_id = #{userId} WHERE pos_privilege.deleted = 0
